html: Today’s announcement from the World Trade Organization that China’s tariff-rate quotas for wheat, corn and rice are inconsistent with its WTO commitments is a win for Kansas farmers and will allow our producers to compete on a level playing field.
text: Today’s announcement from the World Trade Organization that China’s tariff-rate quotas for wheat, corn and rice are inconsistent with its WTO commitments is a win for Kansas farmers and will allow our producers to compete on a level playing field.

html: The National Emergencies Act cedes too much of Congress’s authority to the president. The ARTICLE ONE Act re-balances the law to restore Congressional authority over taxpayer funds, while still giving the president the ability to act quickly when facing a national emergency.
text: The National Emergencies Act cedes too much of Congress’s authority to the president. The ARTICLE ONE Act re-balances the law to restore Congressional authority over taxpayer funds, while still giving the president the ability to act quickly when facing a national emergency.

html: The situation in the Kashmir requires an urgent need for diplomacy. Our nation lacks an ambassador to Pakistan, & the Assistant SoS for South and Central Asian Affairs remains in “Acting” capacity. I urge @POTUS to expeditiously submit nominees for these critical positions.pic.twitter.com/g0JDI5GoHR
text:
The situation in the Kashmir requires an urgent need for diplomacy.

text:
Those who bravely sacrifice so much for our country must have ample opportunities to enter the workforce when they retire their uniform.

Our bill would give veterans utilizing GI Bill benefits more flexibility to pursue paid internships & part-time employment while in school.

html: These workers and their families, our fellow Americans, should not bear the burden of our political infighting. Congress must pass a compromise funding bill that the president will sign so we can return to a fully-functioning government. 3/3

html: Most importantly, federal employees’ paychecks should not be held hostage and they must be paid. It is immoral that many families living paycheck-to-paycheck have to work without pay, and I recognize the emotional and financial stress this uncertainty causes. 2/3
text: Most importantly, federal employees’ paychecks should not be held hostage and they must be paid. It is immoral that many families living paycheck-to-paycheck have to work without pay, and I recognize the emotional and financial stress this uncertainty causes. 2/3

html: Last night, I voted against the stop-gap funding measure that punts decisions on government spending and border security. text: Last night, I voted against the stop-gap funding measure that punts decisions on government spending and border security. html: The American people are tired of stop-gap funding measures & partisan politics. Rather than resorting to another CR, we ought to work together to get back to the basics of governing. Punting on spending decisions now will only make funding the government in Feb. more difficult.
text: The American people are tired of stop-gap funding measures & partisan politics. Rather than resorting to another CR, we ought to work together to get back to the basics of governing. Punting on spending decisions now will only make funding the government in Feb. more difficult.

html: I voted in opposition to the short-term and short-sighted CR. Democrat leaders’ refusal to compromise is extremely frustrating, and after speaking with colleagues on both sides of the aisle, I remain convinced that we could have reached a long-term agreement.
text: I voted in opposition to the short-term and short-sighted CR. Democrat leaders’ refusal to compromise is extremely frustrating, and after speaking with colleagues on both sides of the aisle, I remain convinced that we could have reached a long-term agreement.

html: I want to thank the thousands of Kansans who took the time to attend my Kansas Listening Tours and share their thoughts, concerns and ideas with me this Congress. These important townhall meetings continue to shape the work I am privileged do in Washington, D.C.
text: I want to thank the thousands of Kansans who took the time to attend my Kansas Listening Tours and share their thoughts, concerns and ideas with me this Congress. These important townhall meetings continue to shape the work I am privileged do in Washington, D.C.

html: However, over these 105 townhall meetings – and the 1,312 townhall meetings I’ve held throughout my time in Congress – one thing always remains the same: the Kansans I meet with care deeply about our state and the future of our nation.
text: However, over these 105 townhall meetings – and the 1,312 townhall meetings I’ve held throughout my time in Congress – one thing always remains the same: the Kansans I meet with care deeply about our state and the future of our nation.

html: In most every meeting, Kansans have acknowledged the contentious nature of politics today & I felt this tension during many of my Listening Tour stops. All across the state, I heard from Kansans, who agreed and disagreed with me, about the issues most important to them.
text: In most every meeting, Kansans have acknowledged the contentious nature of politics today & I felt this tension during many of my Listening Tour stops. All across the state, I heard from Kansans, who agreed and disagreed with me, about the issues most important to them.

html: Improving child safety on commercial airlines. Legislation I championed is included in #FAAReauthorization, directing the FAA to review and update the contents of emergency medical kids on planes – something that hasn’t been done in almost 20 years.
text: Improving child safety on commercial airlines. Legislation I championed is included in #FAAReauthorization, directing the FAA to review and update the contents of emergency medical kids on planes – something that hasn’t been done in almost 20 years.

html: Highlighting the need for talented women in the aviation workforce and making certain the FAA facilitates their recruitment. Women comprise only 4% of flight engineers, 6% of pilots & 26% of air traffic controllers – a significant untapped pool of talent for the industry.
text: Highlighting the need for talented women in the aviation workforce and making certain the FAA facilitates their recruitment. Women comprise only 4% of flight engineers, 6% of pilots & 26% of air traffic controllers – a significant untapped pool of talent for the industry.

html: Preserving the Contract Weather Observers program. In recent years, the FAA has proposed eliminating the CWO program at airports such as @FlyICT. I’ve fought against elimination of the CWO program to preserve the highest levels of safety at airports.
text: Preserving the Contract Weather Observers program. In recent years, the FAA has proposed eliminating the CWO program at airports such as @FlyICT. I’ve fought against elimination of the CWO program to preserve the highest levels of safety at airports.

html: Increasing fairness & reducing regulation for general aviation projects.
text: Increasing fairness & reducing regulation for general aviation projects.

html: Reauthorizing the FAA’s Essential Air Service Program, which connects rural airports to the national system. Kansas airports currently participating in the EAS program include @GCKAirport, @FlyHays and @SalinaAirport. This bill reauthorizes the EAS program for five years.
text: Reauthorizing the FAA’s Essential Air Service Program, which connects rural airports to the national system. Kansas airports currently participating in the EAS program include @GCKAirport, @FlyHays and @SalinaAirport. This bill reauthorizes the EAS program for five years.

html: The ability to build or replace contract towers and secure needed equipment to help enhance air traffic safety at Kansas airports, such as @FlyMHK and @HutchGov.
text: The ability to build or replace contract towers and secure needed equipment to help enhance air traffic safety at Kansas airports, such as @FlyMHK and @HutchGov.

html: Strengthening the Federal Contract Tower Program. Kansas is home to eight contract air traffic control towers, which provide important safety services at small airports nationwide in a cost-effective manner – saving the FAA approximately $200 million annually.
text: Strengthening the Federal Contract Tower Program. Kansas is home to eight contract air traffic control towers, which provide important safety services at small airports nationwide in a cost-effective manner – saving the FAA approximately $200 million annually.

html: Establishing fair treatment of UAS by tribal governments. The #FAAReauthorization Act amends the definition of “public aircraft” to include Unmanned Aircraft Systems that are owned and operated by a tribal government.
text: Establishing fair treatment of UAS by tribal governments. The #FAAReauthorization Act amends the definition of “public aircraft” to include Unmanned Aircraft Systems that are owned and operated by a tribal government.

html: Acceleration of the safe integration of UAS technology. In May, @USDOT announced that @KDOTHQ was a winner of its UAS Integration Pilot Program. The IPP is a solid path forward to address airspace sovereignty & included in this bill is my language to codify & expand the IPP.
text: Acceleration of the safe integration of UAS technology. In May, @USDOT announced that @KDOTHQ was a winner of its UAS Integration Pilot Program. The IPP is a solid path forward to address airspace sovereignty & included in this bill is my language to codify & expand the IPP.

html: Reducing regulatory barriers for educational use of drones. Last Congress, I was the co-lead of legislation to reduce barriers for the use of small unmanned aerial systems at institutes of higher education.
text: Reducing regulatory barriers for educational use of drones. Last Congress, I was the co-lead of legislation to reduce barriers for the use of small unmanned aerial systems at institutes of higher education.

html: Helping to close the skills gap in the aviation workforce. I am an original cosponsor of legislation, included in the FAA bill in its entirety, to create a pilot program within the FAA through which grants would be authorized to support technical and career education.
text: Helping to close the skills gap in the aviation workforce. I am an original cosponsor of legislation, included in the FAA bill in its entirety, to create a pilot program within the FAA through which grants would be authorized to support technical and career education.

html: Supporting advanced materials research at @WichitaState that has played a critical role in the evolution and integration of aircraft materials and technologies by continuing the FAA Center of Excellence for Advanced Materials at WSU.
text: Supporting advanced materials research at @WichitaState that has played a critical role in the evolution and integration of aircraft materials and technologies by continuing the FAA Center of Excellence for Advanced Materials at WSU.

html: Bolstering aviation manufacturing by streamlining the aircraft certification process. These reforms will strengthen U.S. aviation sales and exports, help bring new safety technology to market and better utilize FAA and general aviation industry resources.
text: Bolstering aviation manufacturing by streamlining the aircraft certification process. These reforms will strengthen U.S. aviation sales and exports, help bring new safety technology to market and better utilize FAA and general aviation industry resources.

html: Robba and I join Kansans in praying for the Sedgwick County sheriff’s deputy who was killed in the line of duty yesterday. We respect and admire the courage of our law enforcement as they work to make this state a safer place, and we grieve the loss of a dedicated public servant.
text: Robba and I join Kansans in praying for the Sedgwick County sheriff’s deputy who was killed in the line of duty yesterday. We respect and admire the courage of our law enforcement as they work to make this state a safer place, and we grieve the loss of a dedicated public servant.

html: Thank you for those who watched the #LandonLecture. As I stated in my remarks, I’m committed to making certain we #NeverForget 9/11 and how it refocused us as a nation on the things that bind us together rather than pull us apart. God Bless America today and everyday.
text: Thank you for those who watched the #LandonLecture. As I stated in my remarks, I’m committed to making certain we #NeverForget 9/11 and how it refocused us as a nation on the things that bind us together rather than pull us apart. God Bless America today and everyday.

html: May we #NeverForget September 11th, 2001. May we Never Forget the way we united in the aftermath of the attacks, as one nation under God. And may we renew our commitment to respecting one another, to working together for the common good and answering the call to serve.
text: May we #NeverForget September 11th, 2001. May we Never Forget the way we united in the aftermath of the attacks, as one nation under God. And may we renew our commitment to respecting one another, to working together for the common good and answering the call to serve.

html: As I stood next to a New York City congressman from Brooklyn, we saw a nation under attack. While we disagree with each other more often than not, as we stood there, we saw each other as fathers, not foes; fellow Americans, not political enemies. #LandonLecture
text: As I stood next to a New York City congressman from Brooklyn, we saw a nation under attack. While we disagree with each other more often than not, as we stood there, we saw each other as fathers, not foes; fellow Americans, not political enemies. #LandonLecture

html: Her concern for me on that day and her efforts to make sure it was she who told our daughters their father was safe, rather than the television, is representative of a larger sacrifice that my family has made in order for me to continue to answer the calls of many. #LandonLecture
text: Her concern for me on that day and her efforts to make sure it was she who told our daughters their father was safe, rather than the television, is representative of a larger sacrifice that my family has made in order for me to continue to answer the calls of many. #LandonLecture

html: One of the most important calls I took that day was from my wife, Robba. Before widely used cell phones, texting and email, she had no way to reach me besides calling my main office line.
text: One of the most important calls I took that day was from my wife, Robba. Before widely used cell phones, texting and email, she had no way to reach me besides calling my main office line.

html: I felt the care and compassion of Kansans in ways that I had not before, and I am forever changed. #LandonLecture
text: I felt the care and compassion of Kansans in ways that I had not before, and I am forever changed. #LandonLecture

html: On this day, the most frightening day our nation has seen in this lifetime, Kansans chose to pick up the phone and offer their assistance, their thoughts and their prayers.
text: On this day, the most frightening day our nation has seen in this lifetime, Kansans chose to pick up the phone and offer their assistance, their thoughts and their prayers.

html: Earlier, I spoke about remaining in my office and answering Kansans’ telephone calls on September 11th. Now, let me tell you what Kansans called to say: they called to ask how they could support their fellow Americans, how they could help.
text:
Earlier, I spoke about remaining in my office and answering Kansans’ telephone calls on September 11th.

Now, let me tell you what Kansans called to say: they called to ask how they could support their fellow Americans, how they could help.

html: As we now reflect on Senator McCain’s vast contributions to our nation, I intend to continue advancing his work and making certain veterans are treated with the dignity and respect they have earned and that they receive the benefits they were promised. #LandonLecture
text: As we now reflect on Senator McCain’s vast contributions to our nation, I intend to continue advancing his work and making certain veterans are treated with the dignity and respect they have earned and that they receive the benefits they were promised. #LandonLecture

html: The world recently mourned the passing of my friend Senator John McCain. He was an honorable man and exemplified what it means to be a great American. He used his bully-pulpit for good and allowed the injustices he’d seen throughout his life to guide his work. #LandonLecture
text: The world recently mourned the passing of my friend Senator John McCain. He was an honorable man and exemplified what it means to be a great American. He used his bully-pulpit for good and allowed the injustices he’d seen throughout his life to guide his work. #LandonLecture

html: For as long as I’ve been in Congress, I’ve been explaining, “where I come from, economic development can often be whether or not there is a grocery store in town.” #LandonLecture
text: For as long as I’ve been in Congress, I’ve been explaining, “where I come from, economic development can often be whether or not there is a grocery store in town.” #LandonLecture

html: I was walking through the area where the Twin Towers once stood. Memorials had been created there among the dust and rubble, where loved ones could pay their respects. #LandonLecture
text: I was walking through the area where the Twin Towers once stood. Memorials had been created there among the dust and rubble, where loved ones could pay their respects. #LandonLecture

html: A few days after the September 11th attacks, I was part of the first congressional delegation to visit Ground Zero in New York City. #LandonLecture
text: A few days after the September 11th attacks, I was part of the first congressional delegation to visit Ground Zero in New York City. #LandonLecture

html: I hope today to convey to the students in this room – to the next generation of engineers, mathematicians, pilots, astronauts, scientists – Kansas needs you. #LandonLecture
text: I hope today to convey to the students in this room – to the next generation of engineers, mathematicians, pilots, astronauts, scientists – Kansas needs you. #LandonLecture

html: From drones to NBAF and everything in-between, industry and research need young people, and young people need opportunities. #LandonLecture
text: From drones to NBAF and everything in-between, industry and research need young people, and young people need opportunities. #LandonLecture

html: Plain and simple: Canadian and Mexican markets are vital to our state and both countries need to be part of a final NAFTA agreement. #LandonLecture
text: Plain and simple: Canadian and Mexican markets are vital to our state and both countries need to be part of a final NAFTA agreement. #LandonLecture

html: We ought to continue working to improve pre-existing trade deals, including the North American Free Trade Agreement, and re-engaging in others, such as the Trans-Pacific Partnership. #LandonLecture
text: We ought to continue working to improve pre-existing trade deals, including the North American Free Trade Agreement, and re-engaging in others, such as the Trans-Pacific Partnership. #LandonLecture

html: Tough enforcement of trade rules is a good idea, especially when it comes to dealing with China, but a trade war is not. #LandonLecture
text: Tough enforcement of trade rules is a good idea, especially when it comes to dealing with China, but a trade war is not. #LandonLecture

html: But I’m also going to discuss how we should “never forget” how we came together as a country to help one another after that horrific day 17 years ago. #LandonLecture
text: But I’m also going to discuss how we should “never forget” how we came together as a country to help one another after that horrific day 17 years ago. #LandonLecture

html: Today, I am going to speak to you about how 9/11 changed me as a legislator and the issues I have been called to help solve in order to make a difference in Kansas and our country. #LandonLecture
text: Today, I am going to speak to you about how 9/11 changed me as a legislator and the issues I have been called to help solve in order to make a difference in Kansas and our country. #LandonLecture

html: determined to tackle every problem I could, to seize every moment of every day to fight for not only those who were sent into harm’s way, but for our farmers, our ranchers, our teachers, our veterans, and our way of life. #LandonLecture
text: determined to tackle every problem I could, to seize every moment of every day to fight for not only those who were sent into harm’s way, but for our farmers, our ranchers, our teachers, our veterans, and our way of life. #LandonLecture

html: As Kansans returned to work and profoundly demonstrated that they would not be held hostage by fear, I returned to work as your representative with a new fire, a new passion and a new sense of purpose,
text: As Kansans returned to work and profoundly demonstrated that they would not be held hostage by fear, I returned to work as your representative with a new fire, a new passion and a new sense of purpose,

html: In a new way, I had a duty not only to preserve the Kansas way of life that I cared so much about, but the American way of life. #LandonLecture
text: In a new way, I had a duty not only to preserve the Kansas way of life that I cared so much about, but the American way of life. #LandonLecture

html: This day 17 years ago changed me – the way I viewed public service and advocated for Kansans and our country. It broadened my prospective and deepened my resolve. #LandonLecture
text: This day 17 years ago changed me – the way I viewed public service and advocated for Kansans and our country. It broadened my prospective and deepened my resolve. #LandonLecture

html: I stood side-by-side with Chuck and we turned on the television in time to witness a second airplane crash into the South Tower of the World Trade Center. Immediately, we concluded: “This can’t be an accident.” #LandonLecture
text: I stood side-by-side with Chuck and we turned on the television in time to witness a second airplane crash into the South Tower of the World Trade Center. Immediately, we concluded: “This can’t be an accident.” #LandonLecture

html: I had just finished my regular morning workout when, with my colleague from New York, then-Representative @ChuckSchumer, we first heard reports of a plane crashing into a high-rise building in New York City. #LandonLecture
text: I had just finished my regular morning workout when, with my colleague from New York, then-Representative @ChuckSchumer, we first heard reports of a plane crashing into a high-rise building in New York City. #LandonLecture

html: With ongoing efforts to disrupt our elections, we must take measures to protect our systems. html: Trade and exports are how we earn a living in Kansas. The effects of the current tariffs are real and farmers, ranchers and our nation’s manufacturing industry cannot afford a trade war.
text: Trade and exports are how we earn a living in Kansas. The effects of the current tariffs are real and farmers, ranchers and our nation’s manufacturing industry cannot afford a trade war.

html: Any further escalation of the trade dispute with China that results in more tariffs will only cause harm to families, farmers, manufacturers, workers, consumers and businesses – the very people and industries that USTR is supposed to help succeed.
text: Any further escalation of the trade dispute with China that results in more tariffs will only cause harm to families, farmers, manufacturers, workers, consumers and businesses – the very people and industries that USTR is supposed to help succeed.

html: The tactics we see now – where the United States imposes tariffs, China responds, the United States threatens more tariffs, China responds and so forth – appear to have gotten China’s attention, but more tariffs cannot be the ultimate answer.
text: The tactics we see now – where the United States imposes tariffs, China responds, the United States threatens more tariffs, China responds and so forth – appear to have gotten China’s attention, but more tariffs cannot be the ultimate answer.

html: While I applaud the administration’s efforts to crack down on China’s unfair trade practices, I’m questioning Ambassador Lighthizer on the administration’s tactics and strategy regarding how it is negotiating with China. html: I’m concerned that Chinese pressure has caused another country to end its recognition of Taiwan. Taiwan is a vibrant democracy and a key trade partner for Kansas and the U.S., and it is important for our nation to stand firm in our friendship to Taiwan.
text: I’m concerned that Chinese pressure has caused another country to end its recognition of Taiwan. Taiwan is a vibrant democracy and a key trade partner for Kansas and the U.S., and it is important for our nation to stand firm in our friendship to Taiwan.

html: Our immigration system is broken. This has become more evident in the last week when children are being forcibly separated from their parents. I oppose this policy and am working with my Senate colleagues and administration officials to bring the current circumstances to an end.
text: Our immigration system is broken. This has become more evident in the last week when children are being forcibly separated from their parents. I oppose this policy and am working with my Senate colleagues and administration officials to bring the current circumstances to an end.

html: Continuing my investigation w/ @SenBlumenthal into systemic abuse within Olympic & amateur sports. It's imperative we get answers to our questions: who knew about the abuse? When did they know? What did they do with that information? And, importantly, why?https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1DXxyXqWeMYJM …
text: Continuing my investigation w/ @SenBlumenthal into systemic abuse within Olympic & amateur sports. It's imperative we get answers to our questions: who knew about the abuse? When did they know? What did they do with that information? And, importantly, why?https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1DXxyXqWeMYJM …

html: Many of our Olympic athletes who stood tall on the international stage were suffering behind the scenes — their stories break our hearts and motivate us to work toward real, lasting change. I look forward to continuing our work to drive out this disturbing abuse.pic.twitter.com/8c4RXbJItn
text: Many of our Olympic athletes who stood tall on the international stage were suffering behind the scenes — their stories break our hearts and motivate us to work toward real, lasting change. I look forward to continuing our work to drive out this disturbing abuse.pic.twitter.com/8c4RXbJItn

text: I applaud the Senate for passing the #VAMISSIONAct, which includes major reforms I cosponsored with @JerryMoran to expand health care choices for veterans & transform the VA into an integrated 21st century health care system https://www.mccain.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=press-releases&id=98669DE9-9160-4E23-8E28-6790573EE9D4 …

html: I’m proud the Senate overwhelmingly supported the #VAMISSIONAct that empowers our veterans and provides our nation’s heroes with the timely and quality healthcare they deserve. With Memorial Day approaching, I look forward to @POTUS signing this bill into law.pic.twitter.com/9r8Phx6nka
text: I’m proud the Senate overwhelmingly supported the #VAMISSIONAct that empowers our veterans and provides our nation’s heroes with the timely and quality healthcare they deserve. With Memorial Day approaching, I look forward to @POTUS signing this bill into law.pic.twitter.com/9r8Phx6nka

html: We’re working hard to foster innovation within the VA. This bill creates the VA Center for Innovation, allowing the VA to develop and carry out pilot programs to explore innovative approaches to improving care, access to care and cost of care to better assist our veterans.pic.twitter.com/PrEvACFjBz
text: We’re working hard to foster innovation within the VA. This bill creates the VA Center for Innovation, allowing the VA to develop and carry out pilot programs to explore innovative approaches to improving care, access to care and cost of care to better assist our veterans.pic.twitter.com/PrEvACFjBz

html: The VA is known as a high-quality provider of telemedicine, but the opportunity to expand that – especially for rural veterans or veterans needing specialty care – is one that I am pleased we incorporated into the #VAMISSIONAct.pic.twitter.com/9NrpI8klmk
text: The VA is known as a high-quality provider of telemedicine, but the opportunity to expand that – especially for rural veterans or veterans needing specialty care – is one that I am pleased we incorporated into the #VAMISSIONAct.pic.twitter.com/9NrpI8klmk

html: The #VAMISSIONAct provides additional funds to maintain the Veterans' Choice Program during the development and implementation of the new Community Care Program and removes the barrier between Choice-specific funds and other community care funds.pic.twitter.com/08JN9HUCec
text: The #VAMISSIONAct provides additional funds to maintain the Veterans' Choice Program during the development and implementation of the new Community Care Program and removes the barrier between Choice-specific funds and other community care funds.pic.twitter.com/08JN9HUCec

html: Walk-in care is becoming more common. This legislation allows our veterans to receive care from local walk-in clinics, convenient-care clinics & federally-funded health centers, giving veterans the same access to non-emergent convenience care in the community as non-veterans.pic.twitter.com/yZwcqIAuQt
text: Walk-in care is becoming more common. This legislation allows our veterans to receive care from local walk-in clinics, convenient-care clinics & federally-funded health centers, giving veterans the same access to non-emergent convenience care in the community as non-veterans.pic.twitter.com/yZwcqIAuQt

html: Representing a rural state, I am pleased the #VAMISSIONAct requires community care be paid for at critical access hospital designation Medicare rates, encouraging our rural hospitals to accept veterans into their community care program. More information ↓pic.twitter.com/n6XHL2uvvm
text: Representing a rural state, I am pleased the #VAMISSIONAct requires community care be paid for at critical access hospital designation Medicare rates, encouraging our rural hospitals to accept veterans into their community care program. More information ↓pic.twitter.com/n6XHL2uvvm

html: #VAMISSIONAct requires market area assessments to determine where VA care is available in the community & where it excels. These assessments will provide Congress a better understanding of redundancies & what kind of care is in the best interest of the veteran.pic.twitter.com/kkzLpIsMyV
text: #VAMISSIONAct requires market area assessments to determine where VA care is available in the community & where it excels. These assessments will provide Congress a better understanding of redundancies & what kind of care is in the best interest of the veteran.pic.twitter.com/kkzLpIsMyV

html: Too often veterans must return to the VA every time they need treatment stemming from the original purpose of seeking care in the community. This legislation cuts red tape by making certain an entire episode of care is treated to completion in the community. More ↓pic.twitter.com/dX3CVzZYac
text: Too often veterans must return to the VA every time they need treatment stemming from the original purpose of seeking care in the community. This legislation cuts red tape by making certain an entire episode of care is treated to completion in the community. More ↓pic.twitter.com/dX3CVzZYac

html: Veterans will now have the ability to appeal a decision made by the VA if they believe their VA provider is wrongly denying them access to community care – giving the veteran an additional option for recourse and putting their care decisions back in their own hands.pic.twitter.com/Et9GF0WHej
text: Veterans will now have the ability to appeal a decision made by the VA if they believe their VA provider is wrongly denying them access to community care – giving the veteran an additional option for recourse and putting their care decisions back in their own hands.pic.twitter.com/Et9GF0WHej
